channel.title: CVE Feed for Hyland Software, Inc. -- Perceptive Document Filters
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hyland Software, Inc. -- Perceptive Document Filters

item.title: CVE-2018-3844|2024-09-17T01:11:05.810Z -- hyland%20software%2C%20inc. -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: In Hyland Perceptive Document Filters 11.4.0.2647 - x86/x64 Windows/Linux, a crafted DOCX document can lead to a use-after-free resulting in direct code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-3855|2024-09-17T04:00:10.983Z -- hyland%20software%2C%20inc. -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: In Hyland Perceptive Document Filters 11.4.0.2647 - x86/x64 Windows/Linux, a crafted OpenDocument document can lead to a SkCanvas object double free resulting in direct code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-3851|2024-09-17T02:16:49.561Z -- hyland%20software%2C%20inc. -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: In Hyland Perceptive Document Filters 11.4.0.2647 - x86/x64 Windows/Linux, an exploitable stack-based buffer overflow exists in the DOC-to-HTML conversion functionality of the Hyland Perceptive Document Filters version 11.4.0.2647. A crafted .doc document can lead to a stack-based buffer, resulting in direct code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-3845|2024-09-17T01:31:54.803Z -- hyland%20software%2C%20inc. -- perceptive%20document%20filters
item.description: In Hyland Perceptive Document Filters 11.4.0.2647 - x86/x64 Windows/Linux, a crafted OpenDocument document can lead to a SkCanvas object double free resulting in direct code execution.
